body: Obvious plot, damn, if it was a long series with a less obvious plot, then I would enjoy this even more.

It'd be dissapointing if the author made so many alisa works only for the 5th one to end with NTR. I doubt it too but it's not impossible. At the least this guy's potential ntr would be slightly more thought out than the usual ntr
Can only hope for a good ending. It'll piss me off otherwise.

Dude I'm sure that in a sequel it will be ntr so why the author makes it seem like a cliffhanger? We all know that she will submit to that faggot master and will say that she likes him and his cock much more than her leader, such a shit sequel it will be, cliche as it seems, print it well dudes, and see it.
